description: This file defines and exports a React hook called useKYC which manages CRUD operations, real-time updates, and internal state for KYC submission data stored in a Supabase database. It interacts with the 'kyc_submissions' table, handling fetch, create, update, delete, and real-time subscription functionalities.

methods.name: useKYC()
methods.description: Hook to perform CRUD operations for the 'kyc_submissions' table, providing methods for fetching, creating, updating, deleting submissions, and managing real-time updates.
